an2.163:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these two qualities. What two? Skillfulness inenteringa meditative attainment and skillfulness in emerging from a meditative attainment. These are the two qualities."[n.33]Mp:"Skillfulness in (entering) a meditative attainment(samāpattikusalatā)is facility in entering the attainment after one has understood suitability in food and climate. Skillfulness in emerging from a meditative attainment(samāpattivuṭṭhānakusalatā)is skill in emerging at the predetermined time."
